bullet_text.last_approved_text: All Ranks Fire||All ranks can fire if using a weapon that only allows 1 rank to do so.

bullet_text.last_approved_text: Berserk||This unit can go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies.

bullet_text.last_approved_text: Causes Fear||This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

bullet_text.last_approved_text: Causes Terror||This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

unit_attributes.bullet_text: Causes Terror||This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

bullet_text.last_approved_text: Disciplined||This unit does not suffer a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty when the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

bullet_text.last_approved_text: Encourage||This unit provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
